Portal will always, and has always been my personal favorite game. Many people would agree with me that the mechanics and story of portal are like no other. Being completely isolated with no one but an insane robot that makes you do her test until she inevitably tries to kill you, now that's what a story is.
Should have bought the game sooner, it's incredible. Love the music

UNA JOYA PERDIDA

Este es uno de esos juegos que compré por descuento en un bundle y no lo abrí por años pensando que era un juego más de puzzles - que equivocado estaba.

Jugar Portal fue más que una satisfacción. La historia, el soundtrack, la mecánica distinta para ser un first person shooter, el guión y los detalles... incluso los créditos!. Se nota que ha sido un juego muy bien pensado y desarrollado con muchas ganas. No por nada ha sido el mejor juego del año 2007. 

Hazte un favor, adquiérelo y juégalo inmediatamente. Cuando lo termines, continúa con su secuela que es otra joya.
Es un juego sencillo, pero a la vez complejo en algunos aspectos, simplemente maravilloso, muy divertido y recomendado

A quick personal review of Portal.

Portal is a unique and fun puzzle game with an interesting story that will keep you on the edge of your seat the whole time.

Pros
-Unique portal mechanic that leads to very creative and challenging puzzles 
-Story that isn't right in front of you which adds replayability
-Engaging gameplay that doesn't get old 
-Well written antagonist who is very entertaining 

Cons
-The game is too short 
-The controls can be clunky at times 

This review was formed from my personal opinions. I recommend you get the game and form your own opinions.

Final rating 9/10

A short (can be completed in one afternoon) but interesting puzzle game. Step into Aperture Science Laboratories as you complete test chambers with a portal gun as GLaDOS "guides" you. Portal still has a lot to offer after completing the game such as the advanced test chambers and challenges to exercise your brain a little more, definitely a classic in PC gaming that is an essential to pick up.

Amazing

One of the more interesting games I've played. Using a gun which allows traversal between different points. The story was pretty decent but the level design is what you'd want for a game like this. However compared to portal 2 a lot of things are inferior in comparison. However it still holds up for 2007 although in some areas it just feels like they just took half life 2 assets and reskinned them. I think the concept is genius and the overall gameplay is fun, although I didn't really find much to do after I beat the game besides beat the challenge levels. I'd SERIOUSLY recommend getting this with the valve complete pack.
